advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
• “Best. Streaming music app. Ever.” — CNET News
• “Editor’s Choice” — PC Magazine
• “If you like exploring new music, (Slacker’s) hand-selected genre channels are completely entertaining.” — Boing Boing

Sit back, relax, and let Slacker’s team of human DJs entertain you with handpicked music for any moment. 
Slacker brings the human touch back to streaming radio, with hundreds of stations and original programs created and hosted by our passionate team of DJs. With millions of songs, ESPN sports, ABC News, The Weather Channel, and the best in talk and comedy, it’s easy to connect with the content you love. Choose a station, or enter a song, artist, or album to get started. Then customize the experience by hearting the songs you love, and banning the songs you don’t. You can even tell Slacker to play newer or older songs, or deeper cuts from a favorite artist.

• Hundreds of Handcrafted Stations – Lean back and let our team of passionate DJs entertain you, or create your own station with all your favorite artists
• More than 15 Million Songs at Your Fingertips – From Pop to rock, country to hip hop, we’ve got you covered
• Simply Perfect – Simple heart and ban controls make it easy to customize any station, so the music always fits your mood
• News, Sports, Comedy and Weather – Stay informed with customizable updates from ESPN, ABC News and the Weather Channel 
• Slacker Radio Plus – Upgrade to Radio Plus and get ad-free listening, unlimited song skips and offline listening for just $3.99 a month
